phrases: You meet eyes with her for three seconds, and...
Something bad happens a week later.
So Yuka met eyes with her and she got a cold.
I am sorry, I am sorry!
Everyone apologizes to me for some reason.
I heard she is got a really strong psychic aura.
I mean, even her name is Sadako, like from Ringu.
Her parents gave her a pretty blunt name, huh?
I do not mean to burst your bubble, but I cannot see ghosts or anything.
And my name's not Sadako, it is Sawako.
It is written as breezy child.
For some reason, everyone is afraid of me.
I wish I could just fit in.
I heard they get lots of celebrities.
I think that was a cheerful hello.
He is always the center of attention
and he is cheerful and cool.
He does not treat me differently!
Kazehaya-kun is the exact opposite of me.
At the opening ceremony when I came to high school...
If you are heading to Kitahoro High School, it is that way.
People only ever apologize to me.
But he smiled and thanked me.
Kazehaya-kun's been my idol ever since.
I want to become like him someday.
we are going to have a test of courage on the day before the closing ceremony.
I will post this on the bulletin board.
Write your name down if you are coming.
Be sure to come if you can.
I bet we will see real ghosts if she does.
I cannot live up to that!
I might let everyone down if nothing happens.
Summer break starts after the closing ceremony.
Anyone want to come to school before the sessions and help me out?
If no one volunteers, I will choose myself.
Kuronuma's always doing that sort of stuff.
I am not sure we should make her keep picking up tasks.
You want to do it then, Kazehaya?
He knew what I have been doing.
I do not have much to do during the summer.
I am so dull, yet he knew what I have been doing.
He is such a good guy.
Yeah, now that we are in different classes.
No one from grade school or middle school, is there?
but there is this guy named Kazehaya-kun.
More like, he is made of cool.
That was bad, he heard you.
Did he take it the wrong way?
what am I supposed to make of what you just said?
I am coming over there, just a second.
I have not really had a chance to talk to you yet.
I heard he likes to talk to people who do not fit in.
He understood what I meant to say.
I thought you might have hated me.
All the time, I have wished I could be cool like you.
But yeah, I am not particularly cool.
No one ever calls me that.
I think this is the first time someone did not misunderstand me.
But when you talked, you said what was on your mind.
This is the first time I have been called by my name.
It is the first time I have felt like this.
You would better come to the test of courage.
It is the first time in my life.
I am going to quietly write my name on the list.
It will be more fun with someone as a ghost.
Everyone would freak out just seeing her there.
Not if you do not really want to.
you said what was on your mind.
I never did not want to.
I wanted to fit in with everyone.
But that does not mean I was doing it begrudgingly.
I have to warn you though, I cannot live up to your expectations.
I cannot make real ghosts appear.
I do not have any psychic aura.
You are breaking the news now?!
Seriously, you are so messed up.
I have a soft spot for selfless kids.
You will do the ghost thing for us, right?
Scare the hell out of them.
I think I have changed, even if just a little bit.
I have to let everyone have fun.
I am so happy, I am being so useful.
I will try holding some hair in my mouth.
I am the organizer after all.
I thought you were not coming.
I thought you would not get as much of a chill if I told you.
What is that supposed to mean?
Are not you scared being alone here?
the sound of the leaves, the insects' voices...
But What about the test of courage?
we had an odd number of people, so I had to go alone.
Hey, you could have told me.
More like, you are fitting in.
I It is thanks to you.
It is thanks to you that I could speak my mind.
I am so glad I could play a ghost.
That is the first time anyone's ever said that to me.
Do not stare at me like that.
I will be careful not to look at you for three seconds.
But that thing about bringing bad luck
Do not make me say it.
He just stopped talking all of a sudden.
I do not know what to do anymore.
It is like I was just reborn.
So many feelings that are new to me.
Kazehaya-kun gives me a lot of new experiences.
I am so glad I met Kazehaya-kun.
Let us announce the results of the test of courage before we go.
Kazehaya, you are in the penalty game.
You never got to the finish.
to go out with Sadako-chan for a week!
You were with Sadako yesterday, were not you?
I bet she was making a move on him.
You might as well go out.
I will do anything but that.
How could you call that a penalty?
Do not worry about it, Kuronuma.
That is not how it is.
Sure, I was with Kazehaya-kun yesterday.
It is because he approaches everyone without prejudice.
I know how to fix misunderstandings now.
It is true that I was attracted by his kindness,
his coolness, his honesty, his outgoingness.
I think I did the right thing.
I am sure I have protected his reputation.
Yeah, I have to help my teacher.
I must have done the right thing.
He might not even look at me after the break.
He might not say good morning to me.
I thought I was used to it.
I was too happy; I forgot I was used to it.
What I was like before I met Kazehaya-kun...
They said you are the MVP behind the scenes.
You stood up for me and brought this to me and talked to me.
I do not think you really understand me.
I can expect to see you over the summer, right?
If you are heading to Kitahoro High School, it is that way.
That feeling I had back then,
the way it is grown until now...
Things are slowly changing around me.
